Class AttendanceStats

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.logic.AttendanceStats
public class AttendanceStats extends Object
The AttendanceStats class represents attendance statistics for an individual. It includes counts for various attendance statuses such as present, absent, late, and excused.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    absent
    The number of times an individual was absent.
    int
    excused
    The number of times an individual's absence was excused.
    int
    late
    The number of times an individual was late.
    int
    present
    The number of times an individual was present.
